sqlMap.sql: SELECT TO_NUMBER(A.ISSUE_CODE) AS ISSUE_CODE ,A.ISSUE_ALARM ,A.ISSUE_EVENT_DAY ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,A.ISSUE_CONTENT ,A.ISSUE_HIT ,A.ISSUE_STATUS ,B.ISLEV_NAME AS ISSUE_LEVEL ,C.EMP_NAME AS EMP_CODE ,E.PW_CODE ,E.PW_FUNCTION ,C.EMP_NAME ,B.ISLEV_NAME FROM ISSUE A, ISLEV B, EMP C, PW E WHERE A.ISSUE_LEVEL = B.ISLEV_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND A.PW_CODE = E.PW_CODE AND A.ISSUE_DELETE = 'n' AND E.PROJECT_CODE = #project_code#

SELECT TO_NUMBER(A.ISSUE_CODE) AS ISSUE_CODE ,A.ISSUE_ALARM ,A.ISSUE_EVENT_DAY ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,A.ISSUE_CONTENT ,A.ISSUE_HIT ,A.ISSUE_STATUS ,B.ISLEV_NAME AS ISSUE_LEVEL ,C.EMP_NAME AS EMP_CODE ,E.PW_CODE ,E.PW_FUNCTION ,C.EMP_NAME ,B.ISLEV_NAME FROM ISSUE A, ISLEV B, EMP C, PW E WHERE A.ISSUE_LEVEL = B.ISLEV_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND A.PW_CODE = E.PW_CODE AND A.ISSUE_DELETE = 'n' AND A.ISSUE_STATUS = 'y'

isNotEmpty.isEqual: ISSUE_NAME LIKE '%' || #search_keyword# || '%' OR EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #search_keyword# || '%' OR ISLEV_NAME LIKE '%' || #search_keyword# || '%'

sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (
ORDER BY ISSUE_CODE) A ) B
WHERE B.RNUM <= #startCount# AND B.RNUM >= #endCount#
ORDER BY B.RNUM DESC

SELECT A.ISSUE_CODE ,TO_CHAR(issue_event_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as issue_event_day ,A.ISSUE_NAME ,A.ISSUE_CONTENT ,A.ISSUE_LEVEL ,A.ISLEV_CODE ,A.ISSUE_STATUS ,A.EMP_CODE ,A.ISSUE_ALARM ,A.PW_CODE ,B.EMP_NAME ,C.EMP_CODE as EMP_CODE_PM ,C.RQPPS_NICKNAME ,(SELECT B.EMP_NAME FROM ISSUE A, EMP B WHERE A.EMP_DAMDANG = B.EMP_CODE AND A.ISSUE_CODE = #issue_code# ) as EMP_DAMDANG ,(SELECT B.EMP_CODE FROM ISSUE A, EMP B WHERE A.EMP_DAMDANG = B.EMP_CODE AND A.ISSUE_CODE = #issue_code# ) as EMP_DAMDANG_CODE FROM ISSUE A, EMP B, RQPPS C, SUGGEST D, PROJECT E, PW F WHERE A.EMP_CODE = B.EMP_CODE AND C.RQPPS_CODE = D.RQPPS_CODE AND D.SUGGEST_CODE = E.SUGGEST_CODE AND A.PW_CODE = F.PW_CODE AND F.PROJECT_CODE = E.PROJECT_CODE AND A.ISSUE_CODE = #issue_code#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ISSUE SET ISSUE_NAME = #issue_name# ,ISSUE_EVENT_DAY = #issue_event_day# ,ISSUE_CONTENT = #issue_content# ,ISSUE_LEVEL = #issue_level# ,PW_CODE = #pw_code# ,EMP_DAMDANG = #emp_damdang# WHERE ISSUE_CODE = #issue_code#
UPDATE ISSUE SET ISSUE_DELETE = 'y' WHERE ISSUE_CODE = #issue_code#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(ISSUE_CODE) FROM ISSUE A, ISLEV B, EMP C, PW E WHERE A.ISSUE_LEVEL = B.ISLEV_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND A.PW_CODE = E.PW_CODE AND A.ISSUE_DELETE = 'n' AND E.PROJECT_CODE = #project_code#
